title: Amazon Sponsored Products Advertised Product Daily Report
description: Daily report for an advertised product in Amazon Sponsored Products

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'DD-MM-YYYY'

Portfolio_name.description: Name of the portfolio associated with the advertised product

Currency.description: Currency code for the amounts, e.g., 'INR'

Campaign_Name.description: Name of the sponsored products campaign

Ad_Group_Name.description: Name of the ad group within the campaign

Advertised_SKU.description: SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the advertised product

Advertised_ASIN.description: ASIN (Amazon Standard Identification Number) of the advertised product

Impressions.description: Number of times the ad was displayed to users

Clicks.description: Number of clicks on the ad

Cost_Per_Click_CPC.description: Details of the cost per click

14_Day_Total_Sales.description: Details of total sales for the last 14 days

Total_Advertising_Cost_of_Sales_ACOS.description: Advertising cost of sales (ACOS) for the total sales

Total_Return_on_Advertising_Spend_ROAS.description: Return on advertising spend (ROAS) for the total spend

14_Day_Total_Orders.description: Total number of orders placed in the last 14 days

14_Day_Total_Units.description: Total number of units purchased in the last 14 days

14_Day_Conversion_Rate.description: Conversion rate for the last 14 days

14_Day_Advertised_SKU_Units.description: Number of units of the advertised SKU sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Other_SKU_Units.description: Number of units of other SKUs sold in the last 14 days

14_Day_Advertised_SKU_Sales.description: Details of sales for the advertised SKU in the last 14 days

14_Day_Other_SKU_Sales.description: Details of sales for other SKUs in the last 14 days
